titles.title: VIRGINIA V Restoration Act of 1993

To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the Virginia V Foundation (a non-profit organization) a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. VIRGINIA V Restoration Act of 1993 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet to the Virginia V Foundation (a nonprofit organization in Seattle, Washington) for scrapping.
